div.p:
Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo die octobris anno
Domini et cetera lxxvijo /

quo die Duncanus lammyntoune carnifex conuictus per assisam adiu
dicatur in duobus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro iniusta dispercionacione Roberti blindsel vnius bal
livorum in ministracione sui officij / et in alio quia non fregit carnes appreciatos et venditos eidem

In curia ballivorum tenta xxjo die dicti mensis octobris Willelmus modan et sponsa sua cum effy
famula eiusdem Willelmi quilibet in amerciamento pro inobediencia Duncani stralogh seriandi et gusta
torum ceruisie sua officia excercen' prout compertum fuit per assisam
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretoria xxv die octobris anno predicto /

quo die fynlaus fores et Willelmus
moyses conuicti per assisam ipsorum quilibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem et emendabit alter alteri
prout Jura volunt . Et dictus fynlaus inuenit andream Kympty plegium legalem pro eo de
indempnitate Willelmi moyses aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter andreas rettre deuenit plegius pro Willelmo
moyses quod prefatus fynlaus erit indempnis ut supra Item andreas Kympty plegius pro fynlao
fores de indempnitate andree rettre Et Willelmus moyses plegius pro andree rettre quod dictus
fynlaus erit indempnis nisi secundum quod Jura volunt

Johannes clerk pistor adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta empcione et receptacione frumenti in domo sua ante
presentacionem eiusdem in foro
Willelmus sprunt amerciatur pro empcione et receptacione frumenti in domo sua ut supra et cetera

Johannes de Dunde conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione et lesione Duncani
baxtar et emendabit eidem vt Jura volunt

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xxvij dai of october' yer' et cetera lxxvij Johne
of catnes clamyt Wilyam of tulidef as merchand til him in that part of rekning and payment
of certane gudis extendand til the vale of xxx s' scottis / quhilkis the said William alle
git that Wat coupar gerd be arrestit in Danskyn for certan det acht til him be the said
Johne as he rehersit And for the declaracione and determinacion of the said debate thai refer
rit thaim til ane sworne assise / the quhilk assise riply avisit decretit and deliuerit / that
gif Johne of catnes wald depone be his aith / that he acht til the said Wat coupar
na gudis nor det / that the said Wilyam suld deliuer til him the saidis gudis clamyt be
him that is tosay v bowndis of lynt and demi pruys' stane of wax / the said Johne
of catnes fyndand souertee til the said Wilyam tokepe him scaithles tharof as
law wil anent Wat coupar gif it sal happin him til optene laghfully sic det
wpon the said Johne / And at the ordinance of the assise Johne of catnes the
grete aith sworne deponit and declarit in presence of the aldirman and balyeis / that he
acht til Wat coupar na gudis nor det And has fundin Robert of bughan souertee
for him til Wilyam of tulidef tokepe him scaithles in tym tocum anent Wat coupar
in sa fer as law wil as said is of the said det of xxx s' of scottis money

The xxix dai of october' yer' of god et cetera lxxvij yeris / Mage branche the spous'
of William lutar' on the behalf of hir said spous' and for hir is bundin and oblist til
Robert blindsel ane of the balyeis of Aberdene in twa hambre barellis of salmond
for fyve merkis of vsuale money of scotland quhilkis scho grantis hir til haue
ressauit in the tym of the making of this act fra the said Robert to the vtilite and
proffite of hir said husband and hir Tobe pait the saidis ij barrelis of salmond to the
said Robert his ayris executouris or assignais at lammes next tocum And failye
and of the payment of the said salmond at the terme forsaid / scho has bundin and assign
nit til the said Robert his ayris executouris and assignais ane half nettis fisching of the
pot wattir pertening til hir husband and hir tobe occupijt and ioysit be him or thaim
fra the said terme of lammes / ay and quhil he or thai be fullely content and assithit
of the said salmond before thir witnes' patrik badenagh the fadir Dauid howy son
to the said mage philip of Dunbrek seriand and patrik badenach the son' .
Robert blindsel grantis him pait of the ij barrelis of salmond aboue writin et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die penultima mensis octobris predicti /

quo die Elena de Kynnore
in amerciamento pro infrictione communis ordinacionis in empcione brasij extra forum

Eodem die megota bryis' . megota lorymer / Necolace et megota gregory ipsarum quelibet
amerciatur pro vendicione laganarum contra statuta burgj et cetera

The last dai of october' the yer' of god M iiijc lxxvij yeris / It is appointit and accordit
betuix Johne Wormot and Meg cryne anent twa hamburgh barellis of salmond
acht be the said meg til him / that the said meg has plegit hir land liand in
the schipraw betuix the land of vmquhile Necol fichet on the west part
and the land of vmquhile Johne androsonis on the eist part to the said Johne Wor
mot with state and possessione to remayn with the said Johne his ayris and assig
nais in wedset for the saidis twa barellis of salmond tobe pait betuix this
and mydsummir next tocum / And failyeand that the said meg cryne pais and contentis
nocht the saidis twa barellis of salmond be the said day to the said Johne
his ayris executouris or assignais / than the forsaid Johne his ayris executouris or
assignais sal pay and content to the said meg hir ayris executouris or assignais
fyve pundis of vsuale money of scotland for the hail payment of the said
land / And that Sowme beand pait togiddir with the twa barellis of salmond
tobe allowit / than the said land sal remain with the said Johne his ayris and
assignais heritably but ony reuocacione And gif the said Meg pais and
contentis the saidis twa barellis of salmond ful rede and swete be the said day
than scho sal haue free regres til hir said land / the said state and possession
beand of na vale / And quhat chartiris and euidentis that he has of the said land
sal be deliuerit frely til hir agane

Johne Wormot grantis him pait and content of the twa hambre barellis of salmond
aboue expremyt be the handis of gilbert the Waus' on the behalf of meg
cryne on mydsummir day the xxiiij dai of June the yer' et cetera lxxviij yeris
before thir witnes' William of Kintor mawnus Wormot and patrik badenach the son'
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die quarta nouembris anno predicto /

quo die Duncanus coupar
in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione henrici bawne et sororis sue in verbo Et eodemmodo idem henricus
et soror eius amerciantur pro perturbacione dicti Duncanj verbotenus prout compertum fuit per assisam et cetera

The vij dai of Nouember yer' of god M iiijc lxxvijn yeris / the hail consale of
the quhilkis the names eftir folois / has grantit and with hail assent and consent
deliuerit that Alexander of chavmer sone and apperand ayr til Alexander of chavmer aldirman
of Aberdene in the tyme / salhaf at the next assedacione that half nettis
fisching of the Raik apon the wattir of Dee / the quhilk vmquhile Johne
of ruthirfurd had in assedacione / and now is in the handis of the said Alexander
of chavmer aldirman / the said Alexander of chavmer the sone payand yerlie for the
said half nettis fisching sic like mail and gressum as nychtbour and vthiris dois for the termys
and yeris of the next assedacione And thir ar the names of the consel that consen
tit tharto / Alexander meignes Johne of mar Johne of Knollis Dauid colison Ro
bert of culan Robert blindsel thomas of chavmer alexander howison gilbert Waus
Adam of crafurd gilbert of chavmer thomas prat androw branch Wilyam blindsel
yungar William the hay Dauid Kyntor alexander of mar alexander hay Wilyam rettre
and patrik badenagh et cetera

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Alexandri de camera
Anno Domini mo iiijc lxxvijo

Vicesimo die nouembris anno supradicto de consensu prepositi et consilij Johannes mathison burgensis
de Dunde Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi ad instanciam et
requestum Roberti de balmanagh prestito solito Juramento

Die ix marcij anno quo supra de consensu prepositi et consulum infrascriptorum Thomas Johneson manens
in quelpnagh Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde huius burgi in fauorem
quondam thome stane confratris gilde cuius filiam per dei graciam disponsabit et prestitit solitum
Juratum / Et hoc sunt nomina dictorum consulum Johannes de mar Johannes de Knollis David colisone
Johannes Wode Robertus blindsel David symson thomas de camera alexander rede thomas prat Johannes Wormot
Adam de crafurd Willelmus blindsel iunior andreas murra alexander mar Walterus aghneif et Johannes
stewart cum diuersis aliis tunc presentibus et consencientibus

Eodem die prepositus et persone prescripte de consilio concesserunt libertatem burgensis et
fratris gilde huius burgi Johannj glenny ex fauore Dauid mathei confratris
gilde eiusdem burgi cuius filiam idem Johannes per dei graciam disponsabit
ad quam libertatem receptus fuit prestito per eum solito iuramento

Die xixna aprilis anno et cetera lxxviijo Johannes baxtar filius et heres quondam Andree baxtar
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
datis preposito prestito solito Juramento

Vicesimosexto die septembris anno et cetera lxxviijno de consensu prepositi et consulum subscriptorum
Robertus de crag manens in vchtirles ad Requestum nobilis viri Alexandri
gordon' fratris germanj dominj comitis huntlie fact' preposito Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi pro quatuor marcis prestito solito
Juramento et hec sunt nomina consulum ad hoc consencien' videlicet Dauid colison alexander
rede alexander howison' Willelmus blindsel iunior thomas prat David mathei
Adam de crafurd Johannes Wormot alexander hay alexander forbes et alij

Die tercia mensis octobris anno predicto Macolmus mowat Receptus fuit in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi tanquam filius liberi burgensis et
fratris gilde pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento
de consensu prepositi et consulum ac partis gilde subsequen' videlicet Dauid coli
son Roberti culan Alexandri howison Dauid symson Jacobi cummyng
Willelmi hay ijorum ballivorum gilberti vaus alexandri rede Johannis Wormot
Willelmi blindsel iunioris David mathei gilberti de camera Johannis Waus
patricij badenach David menyes thome prat thome scrogis Walteri thomson
et dominj Roberti leis et cetera

div.head: Infeodacio tollonii de propriis catallis
div.p:
Willelmus Dei gracia Rex Scottorum Episcopis Abbitibus Comitibus Baronibus Justiciariis vicecomitibus prepositis ministris
et omnibus probis hominibus tocius terre sue clericis et laicis Salutem Sciant presentes et
futuri me imperpetuum quietos clammasse burgenses meos de Aberdon a tolneio
de propriis catellis suis per totum Regnum meum pro bono servicio quod idem burgenses
mei michi fecerunt Et ideo volo vt nullum per Regnum meum dent tolneium
de ipsis catallis suis / et firmiter precipio ut vbicumque in Regno meo vener
int: perpetuo a tolneio quieti sint de propriis catallis suis Quare prohibeo
firmiter ne quis in Regno meo eos iniuste vexare presumpmat in exi
gendo ab eis de propriis catallis eorum tolneium: super meam plenariam forisfac
turam Testibus Ricardo Episcopo morauie Comite Dunecano Justiciario Gillechristo comite de Mar Willelmo
et Waltero capellanis meis philippo de Valon' Alano filio Rollandi constabulario
Willelmo de haia Willelmo giffart . vmfrido de berik' Henrico Reuel thoma than
cart yuone de veteri ponte Waltero filio sibaldi Apud Aberdon xxviij die
Augusti

div.head: Carta super assisa ceruisie et piscium
div.p:
Robertus dei gracia Rex Scottorum Omnibus probis hominibus tocius terre sue
salutem . Sciatis nos concessisse et hac presenti carta nostra confirmasse bur
gensibus nostris de Abirden / quod ipsi et eorum successores liberi sint et imperpetuum
quieti de omnimoda assisa Seruisie et piscis Rubei et albi quam assisam
temporibus retroactis soluere consueuerunt volumus tum quod dicti burgensis de predicta
assisa Waltero de berkelay militi nunc vicecomiti nostro de Abirdene
satisfaciant et plenarie respondeant quam diu ibidem noster steterit vicecomes In
cuius rei testimonium presenti carte nostre Sigillum nostrum precepimus apponj Testibus
Barnardo Abbate de Abirbrothoc cancellario nostro Waltero senescallo
Scocie Jacobo domino de Duglas Alexandro fraser camerario nostro et gilberto de
Haya constabulario nostro militibus apud lacum de leuyn xxv die
Septembris Anno Regnj nostri octauo decimo

div.head: Assisa ceruisie et piscium
div.p:
Pateat vniuersis quod nos Walterus de bercley vicecomes de Abirdene Resignauimus
imperpetuum per presentes burgensibus et communitati burgi de abirdene totum Jus nostrum quod ex concessione dominj
nostri Regis habuimus in percepcione assise seruisie piscium et Recium infra dictum burgum de abir
dene Ita quod aliquod Jus in dicta assisa per nos seu per aliquem nomine nostro nulatenus exigi
valeant in futurum In cuius rei testimonium presentibus Sigillum nostrum apposuimus Datum apud Abirdene
die lune proximo ante festum natalis Domini anno gracie mo iijco xxiiijto

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xjo die Decembris anno Domini
mo iiijco lxxvijo /

quo die Willelmus scharp per concessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta percussione et lesione Mariote marscheal / et emendabit prout Jura volunt
Et eadem mariota similiter amerciatur pro perturbacione dicti Willelmi in verbo et cetera

The same dai anent the actione dependand betuix Dauid spens on the ta part and
gilbert morison on the tothir part of the thrid part of a nettis fisching of the port wattir
of Dee / bath the saidis partiis had consentit tocompere before the balyeis in the
tolbuthe on friday the xix dai of this instant moneth of Decembre gif it be lach
ful and failyeand tharof the next lauful dai thareftir / and tobring with thaim sic euidentis and
documentis anent the same caus' as thai wil wyn and tyne the said day

Item eodem die Robertus glenmalvine conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione vxoris Willelmi
malisson in verbo et tenetur emendare dampnum ut Jura volunt
Willelmus robertson et andreas famulus Willelmi leis quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xv die mensis
Decembris anno predicto

the same dai anent the borgh streking be Donald pyot on Johne pawdy
of the wrangus' halding of a Jak / the assise has decretit and deliuerit that the
said Donald sal cum on friday next tocum with a sufficiant man in his hand and
swere that he nothir lent nor layd in wed the said Jak to na person na
nane of his / nor sald it / the quhilk beand done / the said Johne sal restore
and deliuer til the said Donald the forsaid Jak

Item the sam dai Dauid crukschank strekit a borgh in the handis of Dauid Duncan
ane of the seriandis wpon Duncan sanquhar' of murcroft of the wrangwis' halding
of a barel of salmond fra him be the said Duncan / the quhilk he optenit
before the aldirman and balyeis of before And the balyeis has assignit
this day viij dais til the said Duncan til answer to the said borgh et cetera

The same dai the balyeis has assignit this day viij dais til Dauid
crukschank til answer til the borgh strekit on him be thomas symson of
the wrangus' halding fra him of iij li' vij s' for certan lede and malt

Item eodem die andreas michelson conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione thome quhite
vnde assisa ordinavit ipsum ad deliberandum j quarterium li' cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

In curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xvij die Decembris anno Dominj
mo iiijco lxxvijo / Thomas de culan burgensis huius burgi primo die vocatus ad comparendum
responsurus ad instanciam et calumpniam henrici lichton' et Willelmi blindsele senioris
procuratorum et eo nomine Katerine de vchtirlowny Relicte quondam Alexandri Kintor
super querela eiusdem Katerine prius facta coram ballivis in presencia dicti thome pro
iniusta detencione nouem bollarum brasij per ipsum thomam a dicta Katerina pro
firma vnius crofti dicti le brade croft de vno anno preterito Non
comparuit / Ideo precipitur sergiando capere districtum ab eodem et cetera et premunire
ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus / testibus alexandro androson et
Johanne litstar in vico viridi

The xix dai of Decembre the yer' forsaid / anent the clame of a hambre
barel of salmond made be Johne Wormot on Johne the Waus seriand
the said Johne Wormot has tayn to preve with sufficiant witnes'
that the said Johne Waus' is awand til him the said barel of salmond
the quhilk to preve as said is James cumming ane of the balyeis
has assignit til him in presence of the party the law day eftir yule next tocum
